name: South Beach Rush
description:
One player race against time.. and Cops

Use Arrow Keys or touch buttons steer the car.

Press and hold your turns to drift Radical Drifts reward 3 seconds to your time. Race to complete as many laps as you can before time runs out. Try to get a Rank S score!

You are a corrupt 80's CEO and the cops are on hot pursuit to take you down. It is going to be a lifetime behind bars or a daring escape to your yacht to some secluded European country. The choice is yours...Disclaimer: The character in this game is not a role model. Kids please pull over when the cops turn on their siren.
